input.sentences: suzy and her friends all got dressed up to go out .
they may have drank a bit | but they still had fun .
they loved the green apple drinks that the bar served .
they danced all night and had so much fun .
they spent time with all of their friends too !
output.sentences: The single ladies quad were ready for a girl's night out.
Lots and lots of booze with friends.
This allowed everyone to feel more confident and dance all night long.
One of the single ladies was no longer single after she exchanged phone numbers with her future husband.
